Class Coordinate

extends Object

    It describes a coordinate (long, lat)

    • Constructor Detail

      • Coordinate

        public Coordinate(double longitude,
                  double latitude)
        It creates an instance of Coordinate with the longitude and latitude specified
        Parameters:
        longitude - It is the longitude of the Coordinate that will be created
        latitude - It is the latitude of the Coordinate that will be created

    • Method Detail

      • getDistanceBetweenTwoPoints

        public double getDistanceBetweenTwoPoints(Coordinate point)
        Parameters:
        point - It is the Coordinate obj which we want to calculate the distance from
        Returns:
        It returns the distance between this Coordinate object and the one passed as argument
